Package autumn.lang.compiler

Class Autumn

java.lang.Object
autumn.lang.compiler.Autumn
public final class Autumn extends Object
An instance of this class simplifies the use of Autumn.

Warning: This class is still under development therefore, changes may be made in the near future. (TODO: remove)

Author:
Mackenzie High

  • Method Details

    • enableAssume

      public static void enableAssume()
      This method turns the assume-statements on.

    • disableAssume

      public static void disableAssume()
      This method turns the assume-statements off.

    • isAssumeOn

      public static boolean isAssumeOn()
      This method determines whether assumptions are turned on.

      By default, assume-statements and assert-statements are both on. Only assume-statements (aka assumptions) can be turned off.

      Returns:
      true, iff assumptions are turned on.

    • setErrorReporter

      public void setErrorReporter(IErrorReporter reporter)
      This method sets the error-reporter that is used to report compilation-errors.

      The error-reporter reports parsing-errors, type-checking errors, etc.

      Parameters:
      reporter - is the new error-reporter.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if reporter is null.

    • addImport

      public void addImport(Class klass)
      This method specifies that a particular class should be imported in every module.
      Parameters:
      klass - is the type to import in every module automatically.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if klass is null.

    • srcDir

      public List<Module> srcDir(File root, boolean recur) throws IOException
      This method causes source-files to be read, parsed, and added to the list of modules.

      This method skips hidden files and files with extensions other than ".leaf" (ignoring case).

      Parameters:
      root - is the path to the directory containing the source-files.
      recur - is true, if this method should recurse into sub-directories.
      Returns:
      the modules that were successfully parsed.
      Throws:
      IOException - if a source-file cannot be read.

    • srcDir

      public List<Module> srcDir(String root, boolean recur) throws IOException
      This method causes source-files to be read, parsed, and added to the list of modules.

      Equivalence: srcFile(new File(file))

      Parameters:
      root - is the path to the directory containing the source-files.
      recur - is true, if this method should recurse into sub-directories.
      Returns:
      the modules that were successfully parsed.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the source-file cannot be read.

    • srcFile

      public Module srcFile(File file) throws IOException
      This method causes a source-file to be read, parsed, and added to the list of modules.
      Parameters:
      file - is the path to the source-file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the source-file cannot be read.

      Throws:

    • srcURL

      public Module srcURL(String file) throws MalformedURLException, IOException
      This method causes a source-file to be read, parsed, and added to the list of modules.

      Equivalence: srcURL(new URL(file))

      Parameters:
      file - is the path to the source-file.
      Returns:
      the Abstract-Syntax-Tree representation of the module.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the source-file cannot be read.
      MalformedURLException

    • src

      public Module src(Module node)
      This method adds the Abstract-Syntax-Tree representation of a module to the list of modules.
      Parameters:
      node - is the AST representation of the module.
      Returns:
      node.

    • src

      public Module src(String code)
      This method adds a module to the list of modules.

      This method will parse the code.

      Parameters:
      code - is the source-code representation of the module.
      Returns:
      node.

    • compile

      public CompiledProgram compile()
      This method compiles the list of modules to bytecode.
      Returns:
      the bytecode representation the program.

    • compile

      public CompiledProgram compile(File out) throws IOException
      This method compiles the list of modules to bytecode.
      Parameters:
      out - is the path to write the jar-file to.
      Returns:
      the bytecode representation the program.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • compile

      public CompiledProgram compile(String out) throws IOException
      This method compiles the list of modules to bytecode.

      Equivalence: compile(new File(file))

      Parameters:
      out - is the path to write the jar-file to.
      Returns:
      the bytecode representation the program.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • run

      public void run(String[] args) throws ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      This method compiles the program, dynamically loads it, and then runs it.
      Parameters:
      args - are the command-line arguments to pass to the main(String[]) method.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException
      NoSuchMethodException
      InvocationTargetException
      IllegalAccessException

    • test

      public TestResults test()
      This method compiles the program, dynamically loads it, and then executes the unit-tests contained therein.

      For more information on Autumn unit-tests, see the (autumn.util.test) package.

      Returns:
      the results of running the unit-tests.
